text: Klaus von Fersen (born 29 March 1931) is a West German rower who represented the United Team of Germany. He competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne with the men's single sculls where he was eliminated in the semi- final. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:West German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United Team of Germany Category:Rowers at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Klaus von Fersen
